text: Mirosława Litmanowicz (Mirosława Kałęcka; 6 September 1928 - 18 August 2017) was a Polish chess player. She won the Polish Women's Chess Championship in 1968 and the FIDE Woman International Master in 1967. She was born in Warsaw.OlimpBase :: Polish Team Chess Championship :: Mirosława Litmanowicz Litmanowicz died on 18 August 2017 at the age of 89.Polish Chess Federation (23 August 2017). ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile: Mirosława Litmanowicz Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish chess players Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw
title: Mirosława Litmanowicz
